history.proof: intros P x y H. unfold locally_2d in H. destruct H as [eps H]. apply H with (u:=x) (v:=y). - hauto use: cond_pos, Rplus_opp_r, Rabs_R0 unfold: Rminus. - hauto use: cond_pos, Rplus_opp_r, Rabs_R0 unfold: Rminus.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : R -> R -> Prop x, y : R eps : posreal H : forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v Unable to unify "posreal" with "Rabs (x - x) < eps".

original: intros P x y H. unfold locally_2d in H. destruct H as [eps H]. apply H with (u:=x) (v:=y). unfold ball. simpl. apply Rlt_gt. apply eps.
